titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the University Council, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:13

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, reports and committee files documenting the activities and operations of the University Council.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 1-C (YRG 1-C), Records of Yale University advisory groups.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is partially restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University Council, Yale University, Records (RU 782). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The University Council serves as an advisory group to the University. Its committees study various needs and areas of the University and submit reports for consideration by the President and Yale Corporation.

The University Council may be composed of a maximum of thirty-five members appointed by the Corporation on nomination by the President and, as ex officio representatives, the Chairman of the Association of Yale Alumni and the Chairman of the Alumni Fund. Members serve for terms of up to five years, as designated by the President, and elect their own President annually.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, reports and committee files documenting the activities and operations of the University Council.

accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
